mapper.select: SELECT layout_id ,layout_name, room_name, stg_name, it_name, uid, ruchu_time FROM record WHERE layout_id in (SELECT layout_id FROM layout_info WHERE uid = #{uid}) AND in_flag = 1;
SELECT layout_id ,layout_name, room_name, stg_name, it_name, uid, ruchu_time FROM record WHERE layout_id in (SELECT layout_id FROM layout_info WHERE uid = #{uid}) AND in_flag = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record(layout_id,layout_name,room_name,stg_name,it_name,uid,in_flag, ruchu_time, it_id) VALUES (#{layout_id},#{layout_name},#{room_name},#{stg_name},#{it_name},#{uid},1, CURRENT_TIME, #{it_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET in_flag = 0, ruchu_time = CURRENT_TIME WHERE uid = #{uid} AND it_id = #{it_id};
